evidence.claim: Independent Home Health utilizes AWS for their infrastructure needs.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for data protection in health services.
Integration patterns include RESTful APIs for secure communication between services.
Implementing FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Utilizes HL7 protocols for interoperability in healthcare systems.

icp.icp_reason: Limited evidence of target use cases for X12 transactions on their site.
